requests.name: Login
requests.description:
Make a request to the server to authenticate the user. If the user is authenticated, the server will return an access_token. These should be used in subsequent requests. If the user does not authenticate, the server will return an array of errors.

Required

  • email
  • password

Response

  • On Success
    • { "access_token" : "asdfklj3dj30dfa"}
  • On Failure
    • { "errors" : [ ]}
